demos.name: Amazon Sustainability Report 2024
demos.description: Outlines goals, progress, and governance across decarbonization, waste, packaging, water, biodiversity, human rights, responsible supply chain, community impact, and employee safety, aligned to major frameworks.

demos.name: IFS Sustainability Report 2024
demos.description: Summarizes strategy, governance, material topics, environmental impact, people, human rights, procurement, cybersecurity, and tax, highlighting industrial AI, global operations, and limited assurance over key indicators.

demos.name: Leon County Broadband RFP 2025
demos.description: Seeks a broadband expansion partnership, detailing submission instructions, contract terms, procurement standards, proposer qualifications, scope of work, evaluation criteria, schedule, and required forms for compliant proposals.

demos.name: EBA ESG Guidelines 2025
demos.description: Sets minimum standards and methodologies for identifying, measuring, managing, and monitoring ESG risks in EU institutions, integrating ESG into risk frameworks, plans, metrics, and scenarios, effective 2026/2027.
